text: Solve this question on: ssh cka9412 You're asked to extract the following inforL\ation out of kubeconfig file /opt/course/l/kubecunfig on ckag9412 ; 1. Write all kubeconfig context names into /opt/course/1/contexts , one per line 2. Write the name of the current context into /opt/tourse/l/current-context 3.
